projects.name: Algorithms
projects.ratingDescription: Incomplete, ugly, boring. Algorithms that are implemented are pretty simple. Would take a lot to get it more presentable.

projects.name: Art site
projects.description: Allows users to post pixel art to a feed.

projects.name: Calligraphy mini-app
projects.description: Seam miniapp letting users post a canvas drawing.
projects.ratingDescription: I only did UI; bonus points for being actually deployed but awkward to discuss.

projects.name: Simple chat
projects.description: A very minimal chat built with native libraries and WebSocket.
projects.ratingDescription: Shows off my interest in low-level systems and simple, lightweight systems with minimal overhead.
projects.status: Needs to be deployed and given a nicer UI.

projects.name: Collision detection
projects.description: A collision detection environment that allows users to arbitrarily add boxes.
projects.ratingDescription: Simple, but relevant to the field I'm targeting.

projects.name: Sliding block puzzle
projects.description: Seam miniapp turning photos into sliding puzzles
projects.ratingDescription: Solid enough. Bonus points for being live on the app store.
projects.status: Needs to be isolated and deployed.

projects.name: Simple auth
projects.status: Needs a nicer UI and needs to be deployed.

projects.name: SIN Component library
projects.description: A component library that I built 2 things for.
projects.ratingDescription: I did minimal work. Those two components are decent, but it feels a bit lonely.

projects.name: Storybook Components
projects.description: A component library that I built some more stuff for.

projects.name: Svelte Solitaire
projects.description: A simple pyramid solitaire implementation in Svelte.
projects.ratingDescription: Pretty nicely polished and relevant to my field.
projects.status: Good to go. Only minor tweaks.

projects.name: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: Tic Tac Toe with a minimax visualizer.
projects.ratingDescription: Simple concept that also demonstrates understanding of algorithms - good conversation point.
projects.status: Good to go. Need to clean up turn-taking logic.

projects.name: We Can Be {}
projects.description: Bullet hell prototype hooked into AI for Infinite Games Hackathon.
projects.ratingDescription: It's a bit ugly, and the use of AI feels more like a gimmick than a well-integrated piece of a product. Let's bury this slightly on the list.
projects.status: Ugly, but ready to be deployed. Needs updated fallback data (since I'll be deploying without live API connection).
